name: Gamedev Pidgeon
description:
They're a gamedev, they're a pidgeon, they have anxiety.

It's GAMEDEV PIDGEON!

control the pidgeon with the arrow keys or WASD

Thanks Diane for the image to bitsy converter! https://twitter.com/ker0chanFR/status/977658294176223232

I didn't have time to set up the colissions, so you can get a bit lost...
If you do get lost, here are the the locations of the exits:
title screen: press any direction
entry: at the door, just go up
talk: in the lower right corner, just go right
exit: at the bottom of the way
